attributes.action: follow Government advice and drive 5 miles less a week by walking to the Houses of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The latest Government sponsored adverts tell us to drive less to help save the environment.  Driving from Downing Street to the Palace of Westminster is wasteful and if the PM was to walk it would show that the Government is not a "Do As I Say, Not Do As I Do" type Government.
